node.title: Production Kawaii Debuts Generation 3 VTuber Lineup
node.description: Japan-based English VTuber company Production Kawaii has announced the debut of its third-generation lineup. They are composed of Aletta Sky, Peony Aeria, Sava Safari, Oceane Otoishi, and Miryu Kotofuji.
